channel.title: github on Bluepie's update blog
channel.description: Recent content in github on Bluepie's update blog

item.title: Github Workflow
item.description: Hi… how ya been, its been a month already, gosh times flies by really fast. Status update: I’ve been doing good, When I am in home I complete the work that I plan… far better than when I am in Chennai. The corona virus pandemic is still around the world at large, US right now is the largest affected country with over 70k dead people as of writing this. The lockdown in India has been extended another 2 weeks.
